name: Handle invalid parameters gracefully -- @1.2

steps.name: Given the REST API client is initialized
When I request candlestick data with invalid parameters "invalid_timeframe"
Then the response status should be 400 or 422
And the response should contain an error message

fullName: Crypto.com Exchange REST API - Candlestick Data: Handle invalid parameters gracefully

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Crypto.com Exchange REST API - Candlestick Data
